fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Enact your righteous will on a target, attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you will learn 3-4 Town roles in the game the host considers "Chaotic Good". (Ex: Escort [59], Vigilante [67], Dark Mage [3344], Home Invader [4211])
- If you die in any way, you may choose a player to attack on the next phase, ignoring death.
- If **Partisans** are in the game, you may overhear whispers, If **Fallen Angels** are in the game, you may not win with them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Purge the town of the roles you learned, or see the evil team win.
